name: spi

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wal(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wal(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w0)

comment: Inference rule of universal instantiation, or universal specialization. Converse of the inference rule of (universal) generalization ~ ax-gen . Contrary to the rule of generalization, its closed form is valid, see ~ sp . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
